name: Blazing Prismshell
description: It is said that the more Phlogiston a Furnace Shell Mountain Weasel has stored in its back, the higher its status in the pack. The reasoning for this phenomenon may be quite simple: More dominant Furnace Shell Mountain Weasels likely have less need to call on their Phlogiston reserves than their less prominent peers.
source: Dropped by Lv. 60+ Furnace Shell Mountain Weasels
